General.Name: Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi AS
General.Description: Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi produces and sells cotton and synthetic yarn in Turkey and internationally. The company offers threads, knitted and woven fabrics, knitted and woven fabrics and yarn dyeing and finishing products. It also engages in natural gas and electricity distribution, tourism, marketing, and finance business; and operates hotel under the A'JIA name. Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Kahramanmaras, Turkey.
